SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DeathDoor.NAME: Near-Death Thrill
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DeathDoor.DESCRIPTION: superstitiomod:Defy Death !M! times. NL The first time you superstitiomod:Defy Death, NL gain superstitiomod:On Death's Door.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DeathDoor.FLAVOR: So thrilling, so fun—can't wait to do it again!

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BellyStrike.NAME: Gut Punch
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BellyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a target. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL superstitiomod:Masochism: Only deals half damage, but when unblocked, your Strength is doubled.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BellyStrike.FLAVOR_SFW: I’m Lawrence Barnes. They call me 'the Prophet.'

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DrinkPoison.NAME: Drug Play
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DrinkPoison.DESCRIPTION: Remove half of *Corruption, NL Gain Poison equal to half the removed amount. NL (Expected Removal: !M!)
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:DrinkPoison.FLAVOR: Sweet and silky... who’d have guessed? Not like I drink it for fun or anything~

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CutWrist.NAME: Wrist Slice
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CutWrist.FLAVOR: There's something irresistibly seductive about it.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CutWrist.FLAVOR_SFW: You’re not bleeding out. You’re overflowing. Let me help relieve some pressure.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:NailExtraction.NAME: Nail Yank
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:NailExtraction.DESCRIPTION: Lose %d HP, draw %d cards. NL Add %d *Nail Yank cards to your draw pile. NL Can only play %d this turn. NL (Used: !M!)
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:NailExtraction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose %d HP, draw %d cards. NL Add %d *Nail Yank cards to your draw pile. NL Can only play %d this turn. NL (Used: !M!)
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:NailExtraction.FLAVOR: Rip one off and it just grows back—can't even stick a needle in before it's healed!

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:OrgasmWithLostBo.NAME: Crave the Crippling
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:OrgasmWithLostBo.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a superstitiomod:Unplayable card, exhaust it and add *Feel Phantom Limb to your hand.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:OrgasmWithLostBo.FLAVOR: Sometimes I wish I never had those parts to begin with~ So helpless, so needy~❤

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.NAME: Missing Parts
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.DESCRIPTION: Remove !B! *Corruption and increase Attack damage by !M!%. NL Choose one body part: Its related *Sex Card becomes unplayable.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.FLAVOR: Should I cut it off with a knife, or just yank it out? Oh, the choices~

SuperstitioMod:BodyModification_CutOff_C.NAME: Choose a Missing Part
SuperstitioMod:BodyModification_CutOff_C.DESCRIPTION: This card is for selection only—its name and description change during the choice.
SuperstitioMod:BodyModification_CutOff_C.FLAVOR: So many tempting options… can’t I just pick them all?

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.NAME: Hyper Boobs
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.DESCRIPTION: When losing HP from attack damage, gain !M! superstitiomod:Milk.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.FLAVOR_SFW: You should really know what LV and EXP stand for.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.NAME: Tats & Piercings
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted or *Discarded, gain !M! superstitiomod:Pleasure.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.FLAVOR_SFW: So intense! So electric! Getting to see a true warrior in action makes life worth it!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Permanent makeup, full-body dye, eyeball tattoos, dirty talk imprinting, tongue split, nipple skewers, cheek rings, hanging hooks, corset lacing, gaping lips, urethral piercing, clit charm
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION_SFW: Sea Tiger, Ogre, Heavenly Path, Hellfire, Azure Dream, Darkness

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.NAME: Prolapse
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.DESCRIPTION: When taking attack damage, *discard a random card from your hand. The damage is reduced to 1/ %d. NL If no cards in hand, *discard a random card from superstitiomod:Foreplay Sequence.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:BodyModification.FLAVOR_SFW: Slapping random gear on won’t save you. Think smart.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION_SFW: Basic Armor, Normal Armor, Average Armor

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Dis.NAME: Lingchi
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Dis.DESCRIPTION: superstitiomod:Simultaneous. NL For every card in your superstitiomod:Foreplay Sequence, lose !M! HP and remove !B! *Corruption.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Hot.NAME: Burning Pillar
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Hot.DESCRIPTION: Add %d *Burns to your discard pile. Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity. NL Add this card to your superstitiomod:Foreplay Sequence. Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity each turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: superstitiomod:Foreplay Sequence. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Imp.NAME: Impaling Stake
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Imp.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! *Corruption, draw 1 card. NL (Expected Draw: %d) NL Lose !M! HP, draw 1 card.
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:CruelTorture_Imp.FLAVOR_SFW: Isaac lived with his parents in a little house on a hill.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:LoveDirty.NAME: Filthy Fetish
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:LoveDirty.DESCRIPTION: If this card is *discarded or exhausted from your hand, gain !B! *Afterglow.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:HeavyCuffs.NAME: Heavy Shackles
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:HeavyCuffs.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! *Shackled Block. NL If you lose this Block, draw !M! cards.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:SadismForm.NAME: Sadist Form
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:SadismForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal attack damage or lose HP, gain !M! Strength next turn.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:STDRoulette.NAME: STD Roulette
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:STDRoulette.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! *Afterglow. NL This turn, whenever you lose HP, apply !M! stacks of superstitiomod:Lust to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you lose HP, apply %d stacks of #yLust to all enemies.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:HumanCentipede.NAME: Human Centipede
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:HumanCentipede.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! stacks of superstitiomod:Human Centipede to a target.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When hit by attack damage, deal %d damage to #yall characters.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: When hit by #yattack damage, deal damage to #yall characters.

SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:Guillotine.NAME: Guillotine
SuperstitioMod:MasoCard:Guillotine.DESCRIPTION: This turn, superstitiomod:Pleasure needed to superstitiomod:Orgasm increases by %d and attack damage increases by %d%%. NL superstitiomod:Longing, superstitiomod:Orgasm !M! times: *Instant *Death? NL superstitiomod:Auto-Release.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This turn, Pleasure needed to Orgasm increases by #b%d, attack damage increases by #b%d%%.
superstitiomod:Longing. NL After Orgasming superstitioApi:!HANGING_TIME! times, *instant *death? NL superstitiomod:Auto-Release.
